text: was a Japanese actor from Kamakura, Kanagawa, Japan. He appeared in the second series of Monkey as the horse. He appeared in the Death Note live-action movie as Quillsh Wammy A.K.A. Watari. ==Filmography== ===Film=== *Seishun kigeki: Harenchi gakuen (1970) *Kigeki kankon-sousai nyûmon (1970) - Fujiwara *Tôkyô jôkû irasshaimase (1990) - Katsu Hashimoto *ラヂオの時間(The Time of Radio) (1997) - Mansaku Iori *Hakuchi (1999) - The tailor *Ultraman Cosmos: The First Contact (2001) - Professor Kinomoto *Quartet (2001) - Shunkichi Fujioka *Ganryujima (2003) - Todoroki *Hero?
